definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be, or become, far, distant (NH = BH; As. esp. adj. rûḳu, far; cf. Ar. rah.iyqun choice wine (i.e. from a distance) Frä:158; Eth. rh.qa: be far, Sab. [[רחק]] CIS:iv, nos. 95, 98; Aram. [[רְחֵיק]], [[רְחַק]], and (oft. in der. spec. and deriv.) rh.eq);—
